summary: A comic artist and an unemployed sex columnist are trying to work together in order to win a lucrative comic-book competition.
cast: Sun-kyun Lee|Kang-hee Choi|Oh Jeong-Se|Hyeon-kyeong Ryu|Yoo-ha Song|Do-bin Baek|Seong-il Park|Eun-ji Jo|Jeong Mi-Seong|Ji-hye Ryoo|Do-woo Lee|Jin-soo Yoon|Jong-hoon Jeong|Hyeon-Sook Choi|Seong-hwan Jo|Jessica Jang|Cheol-hee Lee|Hwang Bo-ra|Hee-jin Choi|Hee-Seok Lee|Won-jong Lee|No-shik Park|Sung-Il Park|Moo-yeong Yeo|Ji-yeong Yoon
keywords: women's magazine|south korean sex comedy|competition|comics|sibling relationship
title: Jje-jje-han ro-maen-seu
